channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- gajira-create
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- gajira-create

item.title: CVE-2020-14188|2024-08-04T12:39:36.163Z -- atlassian -- gajira-create
item.description: The preprocessArgs function in the Atlassian gajira-create GitHub Action before version 2.0.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of a GitHub runner by creating a specially crafted GitHub issue.
